original_text: That was the time they made an idol in the form of a calf. They brought sacrifices to it and reveled in what their own hands had made.
korean_text: 그 때에 그들이 송아지를 만들어 그 우상 앞에 제사하며 자기 손으로 만든 것을 기뻐하더니

sentences.original_text: That was the time they made an idol
in the form of a calf
and reveled in what their own hands had made
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자기들의 손으로 만든 것을 즐겼습니다
